reviews.author: Hunter Taylor
reviews.review: A wonderful local company helping people get a great price for their home.

reviews.author: Sakura Haruno
reviews.review: fake reviews from fivers like the other reviewers have mentioned, these guys are crooks. AVOID. they send warning messages in the mail saying "NOTICE: WE'VE BEEN TRYING TO REACH YOU; we urgently need to speak to you. We have a cash offer

reviews.author: David Butler
reviews.review: I received a call from this company saying they were interested in buying one of my properties in Queen Anne. After a few returned called back to them, spoke to someone who expressed interest in purchasing the real estate for $520,000

reviews.author: Ryan F
reviews.review: My experience has been more than troublesome. They called interested in buying my house. Gave them all the info, went through the conversation. We will get you an email offer today. Next day a phone call going through the same screening

reviews.author: WeBuyHouses California
reviews.review: You lie! All of your five star Reviews are paid reviews from Fiverr com  FACT!  How low can a business owner go? LCK Properties will show  you.   Represented by a person that does not exist.well Alex is a virtual assistant hired on Fiverr

reviews.author: Doug Puttmann
reviews.review: They sent a post in the mail that said the city I live in is Arlington is charging me for liens violation s what are they talking. About nothing's true. Do you need work that bad to lie about people's integrity. That's why you have 2 stars at the mosr

reviews.author: Seth Jennings
reviews.review: Unsolicited phone calls and text messages asking to buy my property.  Looked up their listed address and it is one of the US Post Office locations.  Fake business.

reviews.author: DJ Apocalypse
reviews.review: Have you ever gotten one of those unsolicited calls asking if you have property for sale? Chances are it was this company which does nothing but buy phone numbers in public records and SPAM call those people.

reviews.author: J. Frank Parnell
reviews.review: This company sent me a mailer trying to make me think that my city was "charging huge amounts of money for liens and violations".  They are a scam company just trying to get you to sell them your property.

reviews.author: John Niendorf
reviews.review: Bunch of crooks. Keep calling, texting and sending unsolicited postcards despite numerous requests to stop. Do not do business with these vultures!

reviews.author: Jason Mitchell
reviews.review: Unsolicited text messages asking to buy my property. This is illegal activity and has been reported to the FTC

reviews.author: Michael Hawkins
reviews.review: The reviews here are FAKE. All are from Fiverr .    This guy never actually buys a house.. fact

reviews.author: Mr. Checkbook
reviews.review: Fake Reviews all from young people who don't sell their homes for cash.. his clients are elderly people.

reviews.author: Keith B
reviews.review: Cold called me asking to purchase property even though I'm on the Do Not Call registry.

reviews.author: Kasey Frerichs
reviews.review: Makes unsolicited phone calls to numbers on the National Do Not Call Registry

reviews.author: brandt losse
reviews.review: Love this guy, down to earth, hes really got it together

reviews.author: r m
reviews.review: LOVE this company!!! Amazing!

reviews.author: Angela Sushch
reviews.review: Good people with good business

reviews.author: Mary Jean Pinongcos
reviews.review: Excellent service

reviews.author: Liz Herbst
reviews.review: Fake, fake , fake!
